#summary Where are the downloads coming from

= Introduction =

You may notice that the JNLP launch is pointing to http://home.columbus.rr.com/webstart/... 

= Details =

Google Code is nice and easy to use however, they do not host your binaries.  I have the source in [http://code.google.com/p/language-translate/source Google Code's Subversion area] but the binaries are on a [http://home.columbus.rr.com/webstart/languagetranslate_1-x/ different server]

Don't be alarmed by this.  It is just what I needed to do to get JAVA WebStart to work.
